thread.title: BRIEF-BP Midstream Partners - Gross Throughput For Q1 Was 1,491 Mboed

title: BRIEF-BP Midstream Partners - Gross Throughput For Q1 Was 1,491 Mboed
text:
May 10, 2018 / 12:18 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-BP Midstream Partners - Gross Throughput For Q1 Was 1,491 Mboed Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 10 (Reuters) - Bp Midstream Partners LP:
* BP MIDSTREAM PARTNERS - GROSS THROUGHPUT FOR Q1 WAS 1,491 MBOED; 5.4% INCREASE COMPARED WITH THE Q4 2017 ON PRO FORMA BASIS
* BP MIDSTREAM PARTNERS SAYS NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO PARTNERSHIP IN QUARTER WAS $30.5 MILLION OR $0.29 PER UNIT - SEC FILING
* BP MIDSTREAM PARTNERS - ADJUSTED EBITDA ATTRIBUTABLE IN QUARTER WAS $35.2 MILLION
* BP MIDSTREAM PARTNERS LP - QTRLY REVENUE $26.6 MILLION Source text: ( bit.ly/2IbtlCw ) (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
